mapper.insert: INSERT INTO L_LEAVE (L_NO, STU_NO, C_CODE, L_REINDATE, L_SCOREPASS) VALUES (L_LEAVE_SEQ.nextval, #{stuNo}, #{code}, #{reinDate}, #{scorePass})
mapper.select: SELECT L_LEAVE.L_NO as no, L_LEAVE.STU_NO as stuNo, L_LEAVE.C_CODE as code, L_LEAVE.L_ENROLLDATE as enrollDate, L_LEAVE.L_PASS as pass, L_LEAVE.L_OKAYDATE as okayDate, L_LEAVE.L_REINDATE as reinDate FROM L_LEAVE WHERE STU_NO = #{stuNo}
